author: Aubrey Hansen
title: Donald Trump Has a Terrible Choice to Make as Coronavirus Deaths Continue to Mount
description: President Donald Trump announced that he'd be looking to restart the economy in weeks rather than months. Here's why he's right to do so. The post Donald Trump Has a Terrible Choice to Make as Coronavirus Deaths Continue to Mount appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Despite health officials objecting, President Donald Trump is looking to kick start the economy in a matter of weeks, not months.
